column4: When I try to install 6.10, after the computer boots into the CD and I select install, the screen goes blank and does nothing.  I have my computer hooked up to a 37" LCD using a DVI-HDMI cable, which seems to be why it's doing this.  Is there any solution for this?
what graphic card do you have?
The install will boot into Gnome if I'm connected VGA to VGA
